annotations.description: The Añejo Highball was created by Dale Degroff somewhere between 1997 and 1999. It was a staple on the menu at The Rainbow Room which was the bar DeGroff rev...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Añejo Highball

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Gold Rum
.5oz (15ml) Curaçao
.25oz (7.5ml) Lime Juice
Top Ginger Beer
Lime and Orange Slice

Shake ingredients. Pour into Tom Collins with ice. Top with ginger beer. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8tcWsBNzlzw
title: Anejo Highball
